newsitem.title: USA: Iomega ZIP drive shipments top 3.0 mln.
newsitem.headline: Iomega ZIP drive shipments top 3.0 mln.

text.p: Iomega Corp said Tuesday it has shipped over three million of its Zip computer disk drives since the product's launch in March 1995.
Over five million, "personal storage solution" groups, which includes the Zip, Ditto and Jaz drives, have gone out the company's door, Iomega said in a statement.
Zip drives and disks provide 70 times the capacity of traditional floppy disks, providing greater storage, flexibility and a built-in back-up system for their computer.

An Iomega spokesman said the five million unit figure includes the roughly two million units of its Ditto and Jaz drives combined which have been shipped from the company in addition to the Zip shipments.
In total, the company has seen about five million of its computer storage products go out to the market, it said.
